communities.title: Investigation into the Deaths of JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan
communities.summary: This community is centered around the investigation into the disappearance and deaths of JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan. The key entities involved include the Rexburg Police, the Ada County Coroner's Office, the Fremont County Sheriff's Office, the Meridian State Lab, and the coroner Brenda Dye. The Rexburg Police played a central role in the investigation, working with the other agencies to gather evidence and determine the circumstances surrounding the deaths. The Ada County Coroner's Office was responsible for conducting the autopsies, while the Fremont County Sheriff's Office collaborated with the Rexburg Police. The Meridian State Lab also received evidence from the investigation, and Brenda Dye, the coroner, was involved through her work with the Ada County Coroner's Office. The impact of this community is high due to the tragic nature of the case and the potential for further revelations or developments.
